name: Final 2.0% Quest
description:
A JRPG-themed microgame, made for 20 Second Game Jam

You're out playing video games in the fields, but your console is nearly dead! Beat the boss and save your game before your battery runs out! Learn to exploit the bosses' weaknesses and finish them quickly!

Controls // Up/Down to navigate menu // Enter to go forward // Backspace to go back

Photos and boss sprites are my own, but other assets are from these packs:

  • https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-1bit-topdown
  • https://kenney-assets.itch.io/1-bit-pack
  • https://mrmotarius.itch.io/miniadventures
